actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Public Works.

official_title: A bill to amend section 1 of the Flood Control Act of 1936 (49 Stat. 1570) to authorize the consideration of public health benefits in support of Federal projects for the control of floods.

summary.text: Authorizes, under the Flood Control Act of 1936, the consideration of public health benefits in support of Federal projects for the control of floods.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 1 of the Flood Control Act of 1936 (49 Stat. 1570) to authorize the consideration of public health benefits in support of Federal projects for the control of floods.
